featured.text: In this way, dioxin is globally distributed, and as a consequence, every member of the human population is constantly exposed to this poisonous substance.

definition.zh_def: 有毒的，能引起傷害或死亡的物質。
definition.en_def: Containing poison; capable of causing harm or death.
definition.example: The plant is known to be poisonous if ingested.
